document.full_text: five republican state legislators co-sponsored resolutions on thursday to impeach four of the justices on the iowa state supreme court but the measures are likely to stall this year, lawmakers said.
document.title: iowa republicans sponsor calls to impeach 4 justices
lines_and_colors: five republican state legislators co-sponsored resolutions on thursday to impeach four of the justices on the iowa state supreme court but the measures are likely to stall this year, lawmakers said.
